name: The Voices Told Me To
description:
DO NOT LISTEN TO THE VOICES!

DO NOT DESTROY EVERYTHING!

Comment best scores!

This game was made for the Funni Jam #3 which had the theme "Destroy Everything"

The longer you outlast the voices, the higher your score will be! If you destroy anything, the voices are one step closer to beating you.

Controls:

Mouse Move = Player Rotate

The player cannot walk or move

The player shoots after a random interval of time which is indicated by the timer (the voices have control over your hands and, thus, the gun)

Credit:

Sound design and music by Matthew Hodges

Object, Character, and Gun Models created by Athan Stefanos

Developed by Jake De Andrade
